abstract: Commerce Dept reports factory orders in July rose 0.4 percent, compared to rise of 2.2 percent in June.
lead_paragraph: Orders to American factories posted a modest gain in July, helped by the biggest rise in motor vehicles orders in a year.

headline.main: Factory Orders Rose in June, but the Gain Was Modest
headline.print_headline: Factory Orders Rose In June, but the Gain Was Modest

snippet: Orders to American factories posted a modest gain in July, helped by the biggest rise in motor vehicles orders in a year.
